description: We’re looking for a passionate and skilled Frontend Developer to join our team and help craft exceptional digital experiences. You’ll be responsible for translating UI/UX designs into responsive, interactive, and accessible web interfaces using modern technologies. If you love turning creative ideas into pixel-perfect reality, we’d love to hear from you.

sections.heading: Responsibilities
items: Develop responsive, high-performance web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks (e.g., React, Vue, Angular).
Collaborate with designers, backend developers, and product managers to bring features to life.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Maintain code quality, reusability, and documentation.
Implement cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility.
Write clean, testable code and contribute to unit/integration testing.

sections.heading: Requirements
items: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
3+ years of frontend development experience.
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

sections.heading: What We Offer
items: Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and hybrid options.
Professional development and training opportunities.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

sections.heading: Office Timings
items: Monday to Friday: 9:30 AM – 6:30 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM

description: We’re searching for a Backend Developer to design and build scalable APIs and services...

sections.heading: Responsibilities
items: Build and maintain RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
Design and manage scalable databases.
Work closely with frontend teams to integrate APIs.
Ensure security, performance, and reliability of backend services.

sections.heading: Requirements
items: 3+ years of backend development experience.
Proficiency in Node.js, Python, or Java.
Strong database knowledge (SQL & NoSQL).
Familiarity with cloud services like AWS/GCP.

sections.heading: What We Offer
items: Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and hybrid options.
Professional development and training opportunities.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

sections.heading: Office Timings
items: Monday to Friday: 9:30 AM – 6:30 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM

description: We’re looking for a Fullstack Developer to build end-to-end applications, from scalable backends to engaging user interfaces.

sections.heading: Responsibilities
items: Design, develop, and maintain both frontend and backend components.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
Integrate APIs and third-party services efficiently.
Ensure performance, scalability, and security across the stack.

sections.heading: Requirements
items: 4+ years of professional software development experience.
Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, with experience in frameworks like Vue.js/React and Node.js.
Strong understanding of databases (SQL & NoSQL).
Experience with RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

sections.heading: What We Offer
items: Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and hybrid options.
Professional development and training opportunities.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

sections.heading: Office Timings
items: Monday to Friday: 9:30 AM – 6:30 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM

description: We’re seeking a Mobile App Developer specializing in Flutter to create high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications with exceptional user experiences.

sections.heading: Responsibilities
items: Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter.
Collaborate with backend and design teams to deliver scalable and intuitive apps.
Optimize app performance, responsiveness, and reliability.
Publish and maintain applications on the App Store and Google Play.

sections.heading: Requirements
items: 2+ years of professional experience in mobile app development.
Strong proficiency in Flutter and Dart.
Experience integrating RESTful APIs and third-party SDKs.
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices.
Understanding of native iOS (Swift) or Android (Kotlin/Java) is a plus.

sections.heading: What We Offer
items: Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and hybrid options.
Professional development and training opportunities.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

sections.heading: Office Timings
items: Monday to Friday: 9:30 AM – 6:30 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM
